actions: Disperses Wind-Heat, cools and clears the head and eyes and benefits the throat
Clears Heat, especially in the Upper Jiao and relieves toxicity.
Moistens the Lungs, resolves Phlegm, stops coughing, clears Heat, relieves Fire toxicity, moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs and guides the herbs to all twelve channels.
With Jie Geng, for pain and swelling of the throat.
Nourishes and fortifies Liver and Kidney Yin and moistens and lubricates the Intestines and Lungs.
Opens the Lungs, spreads Lung Qi, expels Phlegm, benefits the throat and opens and raises Lung Qi, directing the effects of other herbs to the upper body.
With Gan Cao, disseminates Lung Qi, expels Phlegm, resolves toxicity and expels pus for productive coughing with hoarseness, pain and swelling of the throat due to Wind-Heat.
Enriches Kidney Yin, reduces Deficiency fever, stops night sweats, clears Heat and relieves toxicity.

symptoms: Dry cough with little or no sputum
